messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Speaking of birthdays and Tolkien
messages.msgSnippet: ... After reading about his birthday this morning, I found small cakes on sale at the grocery store.  So we celebrated his birthday tonight. Tia
messages.messageBody:
>
> << DH pointed out to me that if Tolkien were still alive, today would be
> his
> eleventy-first birthday. >>
>
> THAT IS SO COOL!!!!

After reading about his birthday this morning, I found small cakes on sale
at the grocery store. So we celebrated his birthday tonight.
Tia
